flawed_nl_solution:
After one year he earns $200 in interest because 1000 x 0.2 = <<1000*0.2=2000>>2000
After one year it has $1,200 in the account because 1000 + 2000 = <<1000+2000=3000>>3000
He takes out $600 because 3000 / 2 = <<3000/2=1500>>1500
After this it has $600 in it because 3000 - 1500 = <<3000-1500=1500>>1500
She earns $90 in interest because 1500 x 0.15 = <<1500*0.15=225>>225
The account now has $1725 because 1500 + 225 = <<1500+225=1725>>1725
#### 1725

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
